mapper.select: select distinct c.class_no, c.title, c.content, c.crclm, c.dt, c.price, c.attach, c.attach_dir, c.job_cd, c.psncpa, c.class_cnt, c.ennc, c.confm_cd, c.guide_id, cm.cd_ini, cm.cd_no, cm.cd_name, dt.term, dt.begin_time, dt.end_time from class c left join cmmncd cm on c.job_cd = cm.cd_no left join class_dt dt on c.class_no = dt.class_no where cm.cd_ini = 'J' and dt.ctime_no=1 order by 1

select c.class_no,c.title,c.content,c.dt,c.price,c.crclm, c.attach,c.attach_dir,c.confm_cd,c.guide_id,c.job_cd,c.psncpa,c.class_cnt,c.ennc,cm.cd_name from class c ,cmmncd cm where cm.cd_ini = 'J' and cm.cd_no = c.job_cd and class_no = #{classNo}

select distinct c.class_no, c.title, c.content, c.crclm, c.dt, c.price, c.attach, c.attach_dir, c.job_cd, c.psncpa, c.class_cnt, c.ennc, c.confm_cd, c.guide_id, cm.cd_ini, cm.cd_no, cm.cd_name, dt.term, dt.begin_time, dt.end_time, pay.member_id from class c left join cmmncd cm on c.job_cd = cm.cd_no left join class_dt dt on c.class_no = dt.class_no left join payform pay on c.class_no = pay.no where cm.cd_ini = 'J' and dt.ctime_no=1 and ennc ='활성화' and pay.category = 'CLASS' and pay.member_id = #{memberId} order by 1
